Content.Text:
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! G'morning, <PARENT>! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>, guess what! We just went on a walk
with Papa! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whew! <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> sure have
gotten big.
<PAGE>
They're pretty spiffy runners, too. And they're
darn skillful at disappearing the second I take my
eyes off 'em. That was one tiring walk!
<PAGE>
Man, kids grow up so fast. It's like you can't
blink, or else you'll miss somethin'.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! I love you, Papa and Mama!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Let's all be together forever and ever! ♪

It's wonderful to see them both growing big and
strong. I hope our family stays happy and
healthy for years to come.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! G'morning, <PARENT>! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>, guess what! We just went on a walk
with Papa! ♪

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Both <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> have certainly
gotten big.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>And they're quite the runners, I might add! Today
was less of a walk, and more of a chaotic sprint.
<PAGE>
Honestly, you take your eyes off them for a
second and they'll be into some manner of
mischief again.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! I love you, Papa and Mama!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Let's all be together forever and ever! ♪

It's wonderful to see them both growing big and
strong. I hope our family stays happy and
healthy for years to come.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! G'morning, <PARENT>! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>, guess what! We just went on a walk
with Papa! ♪

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> sure have gotten
big.
<PAGE>
And they've both started taking an interest in
their surroundings, too.
<PAGE>
During our walk, they'd dash over here to look at
this, then dash over there to investigate that. I
was afraid I'd lose track of them.
<PAGE>
Sheesh. It feels like they just learned how to
crawl, and now they're running all over. Kids
really do grow up fast.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! I love you, Papa and Mama!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Let's all be together forever and ever! ♪

It's wonderful to see them both growing big and
strong. I hope our family stays happy and
healthy for years to come.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! G'morning, <PARENT>! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>, guess what! We just went on a walk
with Papa! ♪

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> have both grown
tremendously.
<PAGE>
And it seems they've taken a keen interest in
their surroundings as well.
<PAGE>
During our walk today, they were brimful of
questions about everything their eyes landed on.
<PAGE>
It never ceases to amaze me how fast children
grow.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! I love you, Papa and Mama!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Let's all be together forever and ever! ♪

It's wonderful to see them both growing big and
strong. I hope our family stays happy and
healthy for years to come.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! G'morning, <PARENT>! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>, guess what! We just went on a walk
with Papa! ♪

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> have gotten big.
<PAGE>
And fast, too. I tried just walking, but those two
dashed off in a hurry. Got a little scared when I
almost couldn't keep up with them.
<PAGE>
I feel like they only learned to crawl just the
other day. Kids. You've really gotta keep an eye
on them, or you'll miss something.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! I love you, Papa and Mama!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Let's all be together forever and ever! ♪

It's wonderful to see them both growing big and
strong. I hope our family stays happy and
healthy for years to come.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! G'morning, <PARENT>! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>, guess what! We just went on a walk
with Papa! ♪

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> are sure growing
like a pair of bean sprouts, huh?
<PAGE>
They're starting to get really curious about their
surroundings, too.
<PAGE>
I told them the name of a flower we saw, and
they got really excited about it. Then it was
nonstop questions for the rest of the walk.
<PAGE>
It seems like only a few weeks ago, I was
stopping them from eating flowers. It's amazing
how fast they grow.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! I love you, Papa and Mama!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Let's all be together forever and ever! ♪

It's wonderful to see them both growing big and
strong. I hope our family stays happy and
healthy for years to come.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! G'morning, <PARENT>! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>, guess what! We just went on a walk
with Mama! ♪

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> have certainly
gotten big.
<PAGE>
They have also mastered running to the point
where they'll vanish if I take my eyes off them for
even a moment. That walk was exhausting!
<PAGE>
Honestly, children grow so quickly. You have to
watch them at all times, or you're bound to miss
something.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! I love you, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Let's all be together forever and ever! ♪

It's wonderful to see them both growing big and
strong. I hope our family stays happy and
healthy for years to come.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! G'morning, <PARENT>! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>, guess what! We just went on a walk
with Mama! ♪

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> have gotten so big.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>And they're curious about everything, too! While
we were walking, they asked questions about
everything they could see.
<PAGE>
To think that not that long ago, they were just
learning how to say "Mama" and "Papa." They
grow up so quickly.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! I love you, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Let's all be together forever and ever! ♪

It's wonderful to see them both growing big and
strong. I hope our family stays happy and
healthy for years to come.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! G'morning, <PARENT>! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>, guess what! We just went on a walk
with Mama! ♪

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> have gotten big.
<PAGE>
And so fast, too! They called it a "walk" but it
was more like them running everywhere and me
trying to keep up.
<PAGE>
Kids grow so quickly. It makes every day we
spend with them feel even more precious.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! I love you, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Let's all be together forever and ever! ♪

It's wonderful to see them both growing big and
strong. I hope our family stays happy and
healthy for years to come.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! G'morning, <PARENT>! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>, guess what! We just went on a walk
with Mama! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> have gotten so big!
<PAGE>
And y'know...they're quite the runners, those
two.
<PAGE>
In fact, when we started our walk, they dashed
off and left me in the dust. I was so surprised!
<PAGE>
Pretty soon our little chicks will be able to fly on
their own.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! I love you, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Let's all be together forever and ever! ♪

It's wonderful to see them both growing big and
strong. I hope our family stays happy and
healthy for years to come.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! G'morning, <PARENT>! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>, guess what! We just went on a walk
with Mama! ♪

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> must be in the
middle of a growth spurt.
<PAGE>
And they're quite inquisitive, too. They asked me
question after question during our walk. I felt as
though I was on a quiz show.
<PAGE>
It seems they've developed a sense of curiosity
about their surroundings. They remember most
of what I tell them, too.
<PAGE>
It never ceases to amaze me how quickly they
grow.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! I love you, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Let's all be together forever and ever! ♪

It's wonderful to see them both growing big and
strong. I hope our family stays happy and
healthy for years to come.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! G'morning, <PARENT>! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT>, guess what! We just went on a walk
with Mama! ♪

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, when did <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W>
get so big?
<PAGE>
They've gotten pretty curious, too. They asked
me all sorts of questions about the plants we
saw on our walk.
<PAGE>
It seems like just days ago, they thought
anything with a stem and leaves was a flower.
Children grow so quickly!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! I love you, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Let's all be together forever and ever! ♪

It's wonderful to see them both growing big and
strong. I hope our family stays happy and
healthy for years to come.
